name: View Policy

testSteps.description: 1: View Policy ({parentTab=Policy, childTab=View Policies, policyName=Human Resource Security Policy, heading=View Policies})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Policies" sub tab of "Policy" tab
And Verify "View Policies" of "View Policies" tab
When User Enters "Human Resource Security Policy" policy in search box
Then Verify "Human Resource Security Policy" policy is filtered
Then Click on "View" button on Policy Page
Then Verify "Human Resource Security Policy" page opens
And Click on "Close" button of Policy page

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Policy module of MIS Beta

title: View Policy

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<heading>" of "<childTab>" tab
When User Enters "<policyName>" policy in search box
Then Verify "<policyName>" policy is filtered
Then Click on "View" button on Policy Page
Then Verify "<policyName>" page opens
And Click on "Close" button of Policy page
